TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedElement extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement

summary.span: 标识 下的元素层次结构中的元素。

span.span: Identifies an element within the hierarchy of elements under a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一页[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档包含元素，用于定义其*内容*形式的运行位置的文本和图形。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 通过使用文档结构元素，页[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]还可以与之关联文档定义的元素*结构*中的各节、 段落、 列表、 图形，窗体页的和表。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 类用于定义文档标记的内容和结构的各部分之间的关联。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. 一个是一个结构元素，如位于表单元格、 项目符号列表项的子级页面的层次结构。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. 一个标识中的项同一页面的层次结构。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它引用的项是结构化元素的内容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 有关结构元素的详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，请参阅第 9 章和的附录 E *XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用并中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，每个都有子。The following example shows the use of and elements in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, each with a child. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element in the markup hierarchy that provides the content for the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应为相同的元素的特性引用。 should be identical to the attribute of the element to which the refers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了一些元素，每个都有属性。The following example shows several elements, each with a attribute. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]
